scripts.ime-build: export MANIFEST=ime,decoder DECODER_ENGINE=wasm && npm run build && node ./tools/build.js
scripts.debug:googlepinyin: cd libGooglePinyin && emcc -sDYNAMIC_EXECUTION=0 --pre-js ./learn/dict.js -sNODERAWFS -lnodefs.js -lembind libGooglePinyin.a decoder.cpp -o debug.js && npm run node:wasm -- debug.js
scripts.decoder: cd libGooglePinyin && emcc -pthread -lidbfs.js -sINITIAL_MEMORY=33554432 -sDYNAMIC_EXECUTION=0 -lembind --embed-file dict libGooglePinyin.a decoder.cpp -o decoder.js
scripts.decoder:preload: cd libGooglePinyin && emcc -pthread -sINITIAL_MEMORY=33554432 -sDYNAMIC_EXECUTION=0 -lembind --preload-file dict --pre-js ./pre/filesystem.js -lidbfs.js libGooglePinyin.a decoder.cpp
scripts.test:googlepinyin: npm run decoder -- -o test.html && cd libGooglePinyin && localhost
